product_name: The North Face Super Zephyrus Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: Made with a wind-resistant fabric in key areas, The North Face Super Zephyrus hoodie is an essential alpine tool for layering or aerobic summit pushes. Insulated with 100g of PrimaLoft(R) One, which has an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio. PrimaLoft(R) One patented microfiber insulation mimics the physical and thermal properties of goose down, but continues to insulate if wet. Hybrid construction protects the torso with wind-resistant ripstop nylon and places stretch fleece panels on the sides and underarms for enhanced mobility. The North Face Super Zephyrus hoodie also features stretch cuffs with thumbholes for extra coverage. Zippered hand pockets are placed out of the way from your climbing harness or pack straps.
short_description: Made with a wind-resistant fabric in key areas, The North Face Super Zephyrus hoodie is an essential alpine tool for layering or aerobic summit pushes.
